item.description:
Technology has made the world smaller but the mind more restless. Learning the skill to quieten the mind using breath and meditation can enhance the quality of life many times, bringing success in its truest sense. In the short workshop of two hours, we explore and introduce some skills and techniques that can help bring success and freedom in both work and personal life.

The workshop fee is $50. The fee is waived for those that have completed the Art of Living course.
item.why: We are one of the world's largest volunteer-run non-profit organizations, and are active in educating and empowering people from all walks of life with scientific breathing techniques to eliminate stress.
item.name: Success without stress
